div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1800px; height: auto
div.p: At the end of the school year, how do you want to be remembered?

div.div: Welcome to Roane County Schools! In a world that is becoming ever more complex and competitive, it is imperative that our public schools provide children with a well-rounded set of experiences that develop the body, mind, and spirit. In Roane County, we strive for this everyday and do so in partnership with parents and community. I am amazed at the work our teachers are doing everyday in the classroom, and I urge you to support them in this most important work.
I am always available for feedback and stand ready to answer your questions or hear your concerns as we work together to make Roane County an excellent place to live and raise a family.

Sincerely,
LaDonna McFall, Ed.D
